mapper.sql: record_id, indicators_id, expert_score, illustrate, unit_name, CREATED_USER, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_TIME, DEL
mapper.update: update score_record set score_type =#{status} , expert_status =0 where report_id in (select a.report_id from indicator_report a left join assessment_indicators b on a.indicators_id=b.indicators_id where a.unit_id=#{unitId} and b.assessment_year=#{assessmentYear})
mapper.select: select sum(expert_score) from score_record a left join indicator_report b on b.report_id=a.report_id left join assessment_indicators c on b.indicators_id=c.indicators_id where b.unit_id=#{unitId} and c.assessment_year=#{assessmentYear}

select sum(a.expert_score) from score_record a left join indicator_report b on a.report_id=b.report_id left join assessment_indicators c on c.indicators_id=b.indicators_id where unit_id=#{unitId} and c.assessment_year=#{year}

select a.* from score_record a left join indicator_report b on a.report_id=b.report_id left join assessment_indicators c on c.indicators_id=b.indicators_id where b.unit_id=#{unitId} and c.assessment_year=#{assessmentYear} and a.score_type=#{type}
